demos.title: üè† Simple House
demos.description: A basic house with windows and door
demos.prompt: Draw a simple house with windows and door
demos.svg:
<svg viewBox="0 0 400 300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Main House Structure -->
  <!-- Front Wall -->
  <path d="M110,240 L290,240 L290,140 L110,140 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Right Side Wall -->
  <path d="M290,240 L350,210 L350,110 L290,140" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Roof Structure -->
  <!-- Front Gable Triangle (Wall part) -->
  <path d="M110,140 L200,50 L290,140" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Roof Overhangs (Main Roof) -->
  <path d="M100,140 L200,40 L300,140" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M300,140 L360,110 L260,10 L200,40" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Roof Fascia (Thickness) -->
  <path d="M100,140 L100,148 L200,48 L300,148 L300,140" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M300,148 L360,118 L360,110" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Chimney -->
  <path d="M305,100 L305,50 L325,40 L325,90" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M305,50 L285,60 L285,110" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M305,50 L285,60 L305,50 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M285,60 L325,40" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Front Door -->
  <!-- Frame -->
  <path d="M185,240 L185,170 L215,170 L215,240" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Inner Door -->
  <path d="M190,240 L190,175 L210,175 L210,240" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Knob -->
  <circle cx="206" cy="210" r="1.5" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Door Panels -->
  <path d="M193,180 L207,180 L207,205 L193,205 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M193,215 L207,215 L207,235 L193,235 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Front Windows -->
  <!-- Left Window -->
  <path d="M125,160 L165,160 L165,200 L125,200 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M145,160 L145,200" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M125,180 L165,180" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Right Window -->
  <path d="M235,160 L275,160 L275,200 L235,200 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M255,160 L255,200" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M235,180 L275,180" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Window Sills -->
  <path d="M123,200 L167,200 L167,205 L123,205 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M233,200 L277,200 L277,205 L233,205 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Side Window (Perspective) -->
  <path d="M305,150 L335,135 L335,175 L305,190 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M320,143 L320,183" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M305,170 L335,155" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Steps / Porch -->
  <path d="M180,240 L220,240 L230,245 L170,245 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M170,245 L170,250 L230,250 L230,245" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M165,250 L235,250 L245,255 L155,255 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Attic Vent -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="100" r="8" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M192,100 L208,100 M200,92 L200,108" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>

demos.title: üå≥ Tree
demos.description: A tree with detailed branches and foliage
demos.prompt: Draw a tree with branches and leaves
demos.svg:
<svg viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Roots and Trunk Base with 3D contour -->
  <path d="M80,190 Q95,185 100,185 Q105,185 120,190" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M85,188 Q95,150 95,130" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M115,188 Q105,150 105,130" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Bark Texture for cylindrical effect -->
  <path d="M90,170 Q100,175 110,170" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M94,150 Q100,153 106,150" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M98,160 A 2 4 0 1 0 102 160 A 2 4 0 1 0 98 160" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Main Branches splitting -->
  <path d="M95,130 Q80,100 60,95" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M105,130 Q120,100 140,95" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M100,130 L100,90" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Foliage / Canopy (Scalloped edges for realism) -->
  <!-- Main canopy outline -->
  <path d="M50,100 C30,70 60,50 80,60 C90,30 130,30 140,60 C170,50 180,90 160,110 C180,130 150,150 130,135 C110,155 70,140 70,120 C50,130 40,110 50,100 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Inner leaf texture clouds for volume -->
  <path d="M110,60 Q120,50 130,60" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M70,90 Q80,75 90,90" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M130,100 Q140,90 150,100" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>

demos.title: üê± Cat
demos.svg:
<svg viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Head -->
  <path d="M65,45 L85,55 Q100,50 115,55 L135,45 L130,75 Q150,90 135,115 Q100,135 65,115 Q50,90 70,75 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Inner Ears -->
  <path d="M65,45 L75,70 M135,45 L125,70" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Body Sides (Hind Thighs) -->
  <path d="M65,115 Q45,135 45,170 Q45,185 70,185 M135,115 Q155,135 155,170 Q155,185 130,185" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Front Legs -->
  <path d="M82,125 L82,175 Q82,190 92,190 Q100,190 100,175 L100,130 M100,175 Q100,190 108,190 Q118,190 118,175 L118,125" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Chest/Neck connector -->
  <path d="M82,125 Q100,135 118,125" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Tail -->
  <path d="M155,165 Q175,170 175,185 Q170,200 130,195" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Face Details -->
  <!-- Eyes -->
  <path d="M80,85 Q85,80 90,85 M110,85 Q115,80 120,85" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Nose -->
  <path d="M96,95 L104,95 L100,100 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Mouth -->
  <path d="M100,100 Q95,108 90,105 M100,100 Q105,108 110,105" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Whiskers -->
  <path d="M65,95 L40,90 M65,100 L40,105 M135,95 L160,90 M135,100 L160,105" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>

demos.title: üö≤ Bicycle
demos.description: A bicycle with detailed frame and wheels
demos.prompt: Draw a bicycle with wheels and frame
demos.svg:
<svg viewBox="0 0 600 400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Rear Wheel -->
  <g>
    <!-- Tire -->
    <path d="M220,250 A70,70 0 1,1 80,250 A70,70 0 1,1 220,250 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M214,250 A64,64 0 1,1 86,250 A64,64 0 1,1 214,250 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Rim Interior -->
    <path d="M205,250 A55,55 0 1,1 95,250 A55,55 0 1,1 205,250 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Hub -->
    <circle cx="150" cy="250" r="8" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Spokes -->
    <path d="M150,250 L150,186 M150,250 L150,314 M150,250 L205,218 M150,250 L95,282 M150,250 L205,282 M150,250 L95,218 M150,250 L182,194 M150,250 L118,306 M150,250 L182,306 M150,250 L118,194" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  <!-- Front Wheel -->
  <g>
    <!-- Tire -->
    <path d="M520,250 A70,70 0 1,1 380,250 A70,70 0 1,1 520,250 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M514,250 A64,64 0 1,1 386,250 A64,64 0 1,1 514,250 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Rim Interior -->
    <path d="M505,250 A55,55 0 1,1 395,250 A55,55 0 1,1 505,250 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Hub -->
    <circle cx="450" cy="250" r="8" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Spokes -->
    <path d="M450,250 L450,186 M450,250 L450,314 M450,250 L505,218 M450,250 L395,282 M450,250 L505,282 M450,250 L395,218 M450,250 L482,194 M450,250 L418,306 M450,250 L482,306 M450,250 L418,194" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  <!-- Transmission -->
  <g>
    <!-- Chainring -->
    <circle cx="270" cy="250" r="25" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Rear Cog -->
    <circle cx="150" cy="250" r="12" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Chain -->
    <path d="M268,225 L150,238 M150,262 L268,275" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Crank Arm -->
    <path d="M270,250 L270,300" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Pedal -->
    <path d="M260,300 L280,300 L280,310 L260,310 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  <!-- Frame (Tubular Construction) -->
  <g>
    <!-- Seat Tube (Cylinder) -->
    <path d="M255,250 L245,110 L257,110 L275,250 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Seat Tube Top Opening -->
    <ellipse cx="251" cy="110" rx="6" ry="2" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Head Tube (Cylinder) -->
    <path d="M415,100 L425,100 L430,150 L420,150 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Head Tube Top Opening -->
    <ellipse cx="420" cy="100" rx="5" ry="2" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Top Tube -->
    <path d="M255,120 L417,110 L418,122 L256,132 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Down Tube -->
    <path d="M275,240 L421,145 L428,155 L285,252 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Chain Stay -->
    <path d="M270,250 L150,250 L150,258 L270,265 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Seat Stay -->
    <path d="M250,125 L150,250 L158,252 L260,132 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  <!-- Fork -->
  <path d="M422,150 L445,250 L455,250 L430,150 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M425,150 C435,200 440,220 450,250" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Components -->
  <g>
    <!-- Saddle -->
    <path d="M230,105 C230,95 240,90 270,90 C280,90 285,95 285,100 L250,110 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Seat Post -->
    <path d="M251,110 L251,98" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Handlebars (Drop bars) -->
    <path d="M420,100 L420,90 L440,90 C470,90 480,130 460,150 C450,160 440,150 440,140" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M420,90 L410,90" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
</svg>

demos.title: üå∏ Flower
demos.description: A beautiful flower with petals and stem
demos.prompt: Draw a flower with petals and stem
demos.svg:
<svg viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <path d="M100 150 L100 80" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M100 80 C95 70 95 60 100 55 C105 60 105 70 100 80" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M100 80 C110 75 120 75 125 80 C120 85 110 85 100 80" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M100 80 C105 90 105 100 100 105 C95 100 95 90 100 80" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M100 80 C90 75 80 75 75 80 C80 85 90 85 100 80" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M100 80 C110 85 120 85 125 90 C120 95 110 95 100 90" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M100 80 C90 85 80 85 75 90 C80 95 90 95 100 90" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M90 130 L95 125 L105 125 L110 130" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>

demos.title: üèîÔ∏è Landscape
demos.description: Mountain scenery with sun and horizon
demos.prompt: Draw a mountain landscape with sun
demos.svg:
<svg viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <path d="M0 150 L50 100 L80 120 L120 80 L150 110 L200 90 L200 150 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M160 40 C160 30 150 20 140 20 C130 20 120 30 120 40 C120 50 130 60 140 60 C150 60 160 50 160 40 Z" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M130 30 L125 25 M150 30 L155 25 M130 50 L125 55 M150 50 L155 55" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M115 40 L110 40 M165 40 L170 40 M140 15 L140 10 M140 65 L140 70" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M0 150 L200 150" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>
